knimeNode.name: Extract Column Properties
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node extracts the column properties for selected column(s)

intro.p: This node extracts the column properties for the selected column(s) to a new table. The new table contains three String columns, containing the column name, property name and property value. This table may be supplied as the second argument to the 'Insert Column Properties' node
The input table is passed through unchanged in the first output
This node was developed by Vernalis Research (Cambridge, UK) . For feedback and more information, please contact knime@vernalis.com

option.name: Select columns to extract properties for

fullDescription.option: Select the columns to extract any available properties from. The node will not execute if no columns are selected

ports.outPort: A table listing all the column properties found for the specified column(s)
